subtitle: If you do not have a large enough frying pan, cook this recipe in a wok or paella pan

method.text: Toss bananas in the lemon juice to help prevent discoloration. Melt butter in a frying pan. Add banana slices and fry for 3-5 min until golden brown. Remove from pan, set aside and keep warm.
Add onion, garlic and pepper to pan and fry together for 2-3 min until softened. Add chicken and fry for 3-5 min.
Stir rice and turmeric into pan. Fry gently for 1-2 min. Stir in stock and kidney beans. Bring to boil then simmer, uncovered, for 35 min, stirring occasionally until all liquid has been absorbed.
Stir tomatoes into the pan along with the bananas. Season. Spoon into warmed serving dish. Sprinkle over the chopped parsley and serve immediately.

title: Banana and chicken risotto
